name: Shared cab meet‑cute
opener: We matched in a shared cab—want to keep talking?

name: Office after‑hours (peers)
opener: We’re the last two in the office… should we take a break together?

name: New neighbours
opener: Hi, I just moved next door—need help setting up… or company?

name: Gym crush
opener: I’ve seen your workout—mind sharing a playlist while we chat?

name: Festival flirt
opener: Holi colours still on my face—video call tonight?

name: College reunion (21+)
opener: Guess who I spotted at the reunion—you.
